verbs.description: At least 2,000 children [V: have] been taken from their families since the Trump administration began charging people who cross the border illegally with crimes in federal court .
At least 2,000 children have [V: been] taken from their families since the Trump administration began charging people who cross the border illegally with crimes in federal court .

[ARG1: At least 2,000 children] have been [V: taken] [ARG2: from their families] [ARGM-TMP: since the Trump administration began charging people who cross the border illegally with crimes in federal court] .
At least 2,000 children have been taken from their families since [ARG0: the Trump administration] [V: began] [ARG1: charging people who cross the border illegally with crimes in federal court] .

At least 2,000 children have been taken from their families since [ARG0: the Trump administration] began [V: charging] [ARG1: people who cross the border] [ARGM-MNR: illegally] [ARG2: with crimes in federal court] .

At least 2,000 children have been taken from their families since the Trump administration began charging [ARG0: people] [R-ARG0: who] [V: cross] [ARG1: the border] [ARGM-MNR: illegally] with crimes in federal court .
